display_long_description:
Claw Match combines the authentic claw machine experience with match-3 gameplay, taking you into a creative world of claw machines. In this game, you’ll operate the claw machine with precision while using match-3 mechanics to tackle tasks, offering a fresh strategy and exciting gameplay!

Game Features:

	1.	Claw Machine Simulator: Operate the claw machine, and feel every movement of the claw.
[media]
	2.	Unique Match-3 Experience: Combine claw machine gameplay with match-3 elements for a new elimination challenge.
[media]
	3.	Fun Creative Levels: Each level is uniquely designed to enhance the claw machine fun, providing a rich gaming experience.
[media]
	4.	Hundreds of Fun Objects: From cute plush toys to creative items, see how many interesting objects you can grab.
[media]
	5.	Realistic Physical Feedback: With a precise physics engine and controller vibrations, experience every detail of the claw machine action.

Creative Levels:

	•	Dolls: Grab various adorable animal plush toys and unlock more.
	•	Yammy Sushi: Feel like you’re in a conveyor belt sushi restaurant. Grab your favorite sushi.
	•	Fruit World: Grab delicious fruits and complete match-3 tasks in a vibrant fruit world.
	•	Mini Cars: Grab moving mini cars on a racetrack.
	•	Casino: Grab lucky coins in a casino-themed claw machine.
	•	Animals vs Zombies: Protect your animal friends by fending off zombies while grabbing toys and solving match-3 puzzles.
